annotations:
Good Day,
Exclusive on our
hands, the vessel below is For Sale;
M/V ONE DAY (Ex Tong Da)
Vessel Type Bulk Carrier / Singledecker
IMO 9363261
Flag Belize
DWT 3265
Built Year / Place 2006 / Rongcheng Haida Shipbuilding
Class Overseas Marine Certification (Omcs)(Non Iacs)
Ss/Dd 2029-09 2027-04
Grt/Nrt 1970 / 1068
Ho/Ha 1/1
Hold Size 48x10x7.5m
Hatch Size 38.4x9.0m
Grain / Bale 3850 CBM / 3700 CBM
LOA 79.99 M
Beam 13.6 M
Draft 5.7 M
Main Engine 1 × MAN 8L23/30 1,468 BHP @ 825 RPM
Gearless
Bwts Fitted
She is trading Med/Black Sea. She can give prompt delivery by arrangement.
Holding full details.
Can guide on the price.
(All dtls wog)
Best regards
Miss. Aysel ÜNAL
S&P Broker
Bridge S&P
(As brokers only)
